mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (ID,AUTH_ID,PW,NAME,GENDER, AGE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, PHONE, ENROLLDATE, COM_NAME, COM_ADDRESS) VALUES (#{id}, 0, #{pw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT ID,AUTH_ID FROM MEMBERS WHERE ID = #{id} AND PW = #{pw}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET PW=#{pw}, NAME=#{name}, GENDER=#{gender}, AGE=#{age}, EMAIL=#{email}, ADDRESS=#{address}, PHONE=#{phone} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBERS WHERE ID NOT IN ('admin') ORDER BY enrolldate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET AUTH_ID=#{auth_id} WHERE ID=#{id}
